title: Goodbye, Thunderbird!
content:
I've been using TB for years and years but this is the end. It was originally a nice alternative to Outlook Express with a small footprint but now it's decided that half my client list is spam. I have literally lost business because emails keep going into spam despite me marking them over and over and over as "not junk".

this is absolute BULLSHIT.
creator: threenorns

title: Disapearing emails
content: I have been using Thunderbird for years. Now all of a sudden in my inbox there is nothing showing. yet there are emails indicated that i have not read. On my other devices I am getting all my emails. My subfolders appear just like always just my Inbox. Crazy. PLEASE help as i dont want to lose all my emails in the subfolders.

creator: hav

title: No confirmation dialog when deleting messages from search results
content:
I am getting no confirmation when I am deleting messages from the search results screen.

Reproduction steps

  1. Write something findable to the search field (at the top) and press Enter
  2. Select Show results as list
  3. Select one or more messages
  4. Press Shift+Delete

Expected behavior

A dialog window Confirm Deletion should appear just like when I am deleting messages directly from mailboxes.

Actual behavior

The message is deleted immediately.

Environment $ lsb_release -a No LSB modules are available. Distributor ID: Ubuntu Description: Ubuntu 22.04.4 LTS Release: 22.04 Codename: jammy $ uname -r 6.5.0-21-generic $ thunderbird --version Thunderbird 115.8.1
creator: melebius

title: Non arriva la notifica "undelivered mail returned to sender"
content: All'invio di una mail con indirizzo sbagliato, non ricevo la notifica di errore "undelivered mail returned to sender" e quindi non riesco mai a sapere se le mail sono state recapitate. Vorrei ovviare a questo importante inconveniente. Grazie

title: Save addresses to Mac OS address book?
content:
Am I right in assuming that it is not possible to save e-mail addresses to the Mac OS address book? If I click on a senders address there is only the option "save to address book" which will save the address in my Thunderbird address book.

So while it is possible to access the Mac address book from Thunderbird and even set it as default for when opening the address book tab it doesn't seem possible to actually save addresses into it.

I would prefer having only one address book instead of two.

(Thunderbird 115.8)
creator: mrmustard1

title: Se cambia la descripción de la configuración de correo y el email predeterminado solo.
content: Hola buenos días. Tengo dos tipos de correo de salida. Tengo un correo@x.com y otro correo@y.com - Cada vez que quiero enviar un correo con uno o con el otro, debo estar cambiando la configuración de salida ya que si estoy usando uno, no me deja enviar correos con el otro. Así mismo, se cambia el correo predeterminado solo, sin que yo haga ningún cambio. Me gustaría saber si se pueden tener dos servidores de salida y cómo hacer para configurarlos para no estar cambiando el servidor y el predeterminado cada vez que voy a enviar un email. Muchas gracias!
creator: mariela.gonzalez.lorenzo

title: Discrepancy in Email Counts After Account Migration
content:
Hi,

I recently migrated two of my email accounts to a new laptop using Thunderbird, and I've encountered an issue with the search functionality. Although I can successfully search and find emails, the count for emails "To me" and "From me" incorrectly shows as "0" despite there being visible emails that were sent from my old laptop. This issue is affecting my ability to track sent and received emails accurately. Could you please assist me in resolving this discrepancy?

Thank you for your assistance.
creator: hunain1

title: Disable ALL Threads at once
content:
Hi everyone.

Sometime ago the a "feature" called threads was integrated into Thunderbird and activated by default.

I know how to disable it for a single folder, meaning if i have multiple Mails with a hundreds of folders i have to do it hundreds of times and this needs to be done again on every re-install which can happen once a while when changing to a newer OS.

I dont like it and will never use it, it just makes me miss new Mails because they get burried inside an unopened thread and if you have a long Conversation it makes it look very unclean and moves subject line too far to the side, overall i think it's just not good. Thats exactly what i believe Folders are for.

So is there any way in about:config or settings, to completly disable this "feature".
creator: FlyingToaster

title: mancate interruzioni di riga
content:
Buongiorno,

La versione di Thunderbird utilizzata è la 115.8.0 a 64 bit

Nella mail inviata il corpo del messaggio è formattato nel seguente modo:

Ciao Andrea N 4 panelli tetto 80 bg L 4000 €/mq 27 più sfrido N 100 fissaggi L 6.3x170 ferro €/cad 0,60 N 100 cappellotti bg €/cad 0,25 N 100 rondelle pvc &/cad 0,07 Trasporto 50€

Nella mail ricevuta il corpo del messaggio è formattato in modo casuale nel seguente modo:

Ciao Andrea N 4 panelli tetto 80 bg L 4000 €/mq 27 più sfrido N 100 fissaggi L 6.3x170 ferro €/cad 0,60 N 100 cappellotti bg €/cad 0,25 N 100 rondelle pvc &/cad 0,07 Trasporto 50€

Le email ricevute hanno sempre una formattazione diversa da quella inviata e sempre poco leggibile elenchi con interruzioni di righe mancanti in modo randomico. Come possiamo risolvere ?
creator: infotek.michele

title: Using Filters to Forward Message to GMAIL (But Without Attachments)
content:
I have been using Filters for quite a while (Works Great) On NEW incoming mail. I have filter set to Match any of the Following In the (From) section of message That (contains) a specific (Name) Then (Forward Message to) *******@gmail.com

This WORKS Great as a means to inform me when away from my desk. The problem is, When the forwarded message also contains attachments. And if attachments are too large, it can cause a fail in sending. All I want is a notification sent to gmail (NOT the Attachments.

I have spent some time looking through Help Topics Just have not found an answer to problem. Maybe there is No Solution.

Thanks Dean
creator: dean49

title: Update to downloaded Thunderbird 115.8 to 102
content:
About a week ago Thunderbird 115.8 asked for my password about a week ago I never had to enter my password. I had auto update for years and lost I could not find password. I searched internet and decided to start over with Thunderbird 102 and a new password. I liked whatever version of Thunderbird I had prior to notification of 115.8.

I have by mail account with Ionos.com as host for many years now using their service. I use Thunderbird on this my Windows 10 laptop and K9 on my S23 cell. After downloading 102 was having a problem with calendar not showing on my laptop with birthdays, anniversary's and other dates to remind me. That problem I solved somehow by extracting Calendar folder backup I made prior to download of 115.8 and then installing with 102. Very happy to see those days.

Now a new problem. Using 102 on my laptop I do not see all previous not deleted emails to same email account as I do when viewing my account using my Ionos.com. I use same password for each each account.

Please how to I view what is in my Ionos.com to view using my Thunderbird 102? And when new version of Thunderbird 116 is available I will try it after backing up my 102 as someone suggested to me.

Thanks.
creator: email14

title: After a filter moves an email to a subfolder, a copy remains 'stuck' in the inbox and appears after a repair
content:
I haven't done anything new recently (no new add-ons, no changes of any kind...) but all of a sudden Thunderbird is extremely slow. Clicking from one folder to the next takes a few seconds, clicking from one email to the next takes a few seconds...

I've compacted all folders, repaired all folders, made sure I'm up to date (115.8.0 (64-bit)), so I'm not sure what else to do.

The folders I'm working in are all 1 GB or less.

I have 2 active extensions; remove duplicate messages and smart templates. Disabling them did not help.

What I did notice, and I assume this is part of the problem, but can't be certain, is that after doing a repair on my inbox, dozens of emails suddenly appeared in the inbox (that had previously been filtered and moved to other folders). Things did speed up for a little while, but then slowed down again. Repairing inbox again caused filtered messages to appear in the inbox.

In other words, I've been working as normal, messages have been filtering to the appropriate folders as they come in (never showing the inbox just going right to the subfolder), but suddenly these messages (after repairing my main inbox) are now appearing in my inbox, at the time they originally came in (they are still in the subfolders as well).

Any thoughts as to what's going on here?

Thank you.
creator: newbie999
